results.title: Effects of beta-adrenoreceptor antagonists on cerebral blood flow of cirrhotic patients with portal hypertension.
results.text_hl: The current study evaluated the effect of two beta adrenergic-blocking agents, @CHEMICAL_Propranolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011433 @@@propranolol@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Propranolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011433 @@@PRP@@@) and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@ATN@@@), versus placebo on cerebral blood flow (CBF) of three homogeneous groups of @DISEASE_Idiopathic_Noncirrhotic_Portal_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D000094724 @@@cirrhotic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension_Portal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006975 @@@portal hypertension@@@.

citations.NLM: Testa R, Rodriguez G, Dagnino F, Grasso A, Gris A, Marenco S, Nobili F, Risso D, Rosadini G, Celle G. Effects of beta-adrenoreceptor antagonists on cerebral blood flow of cirrhotic patients with portal hypertension. J Clin Pharmacol. 1991 Feb;31(2):136-9. PMID: 1672698
citations.BibTeX: @article{1672698, title={Effects of beta-adrenoreceptor antagonists on cerebral blood flow of cirrhotic patients with portal hypertension.}, author={Testa R and Rodriguez G and Dagnino F and Grasso A and Gris A and Marenco S and Nobili F and Risso D and Rosadini G and Celle G}, journal={J Clin Pharmacol}, volume={31}, number={2}, pages={136-9}}

results.title: Comparison of the effects of a cardioselective and a nonselective beta-blocker on portal hypertension in patients with cirrhosis.
results.text_hl: The effects on @DISEASE_Cardiac_Output_Low @DISEASE_MESH:D002303 @@@cardiac output@@@ and portal venous pressure of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, a cardioselective beta-blocker, and @CHEMICAL_Propranolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011433 @@@propranolol@@@, a nonselective beta-blocker, were compared in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension_Portal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006975 @@@portal hypertension@@@ due to @DISEASE_Fibrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@cirrhosis@@@.

citations.NLM: Hillon P, Lebrec D, Muńoz C, Jungers M, Goldfarb G, Benhamou JP. Comparison of the effects of a cardioselective and a nonselective beta-blocker on portal hypertension in patients with cirrhosis. Hepatology. 1982 Sep-Oct;2(5):528-31. PMID: 7118065
citations.BibTeX: @article{7118065, title={Comparison of the effects of a cardioselective and a nonselective beta-blocker on portal hypertension in patients with cirrhosis.}, author={Hillon P and Lebrec D and Muńoz C and Jungers M and Goldfarb G and Benhamou JP}, journal={Hepatology}, volume={2}, number={5}, pages={528-31}}

results.title: Comparison of three adrenoreceptor blocking agents in patients with cirrhosis and portal hypertension.
results.text_hl: Comparison of three adrenoreceptor blocking agents in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Fibrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@cirrhosis@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension_Portal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006975 @@@portal hypertension@@@.

citations.NLM: Mills PR, Rae AP, Farah DA, Russell RI, Lorimer AR, Carter DC. Comparison of three adrenoreceptor blocking agents in patients with cirrhosis and portal hypertension. Gut. 1984 Jan;25(1):73-8. PMID: 6360815
citations.BibTeX: @article{6360815, title={Comparison of three adrenoreceptor blocking agents in patients with cirrhosis and portal hypertension.}, author={Mills PR and Rae AP and Farah DA and Russell RI and Lorimer AR and Carter DC}, journal={Gut}, volume={25}, number={1}, pages={73-8}}

results.title: [Correction of portal hypertension by beta-adrenoblockers (atenolol and metoprolol) and inhibitors of ACE (lisinopril and enalapril) in liver cirrhosis].
results.text_hl: [Correction of @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension_Portal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006975 @@@portal hypertension@@@ by beta-adrenoblockers (@<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Metoprolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008790 @@@metoprolol@@@) and inhibitors of @GENE_AP2B1 @GENE_163 @@@ACE@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Lisinopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@enalapril@@@) in @DISEASE_Liver_Cirrhosis @DISEASE_MESH:D008103 @@@liver cirrhosis@@@].

citations.NLM: Lazebnik LB, Mikheeva OM, Toporkov AS, Komissarenko IA, Vasnev OS, Fedulenkova LV. [Correction of portal hypertension by beta-adrenoblockers (atenolol and metoprolol) and inhibitors of ACE (lisinopril and enalapril) in liver cirrhosis]. Eksp Klin Gastroenterol. 2007;(5):57-66. PMID: 18389599
